name: Covenanted Pocket
description:
Hello everyone from Coscom art group! Halloween is the time to brew potions. Throw away bad ingredients with a mouse click, and don't touch the good ones - let gravity do its job. The scale will help you determine a good ingredient in front of you or a bad one. As gravity increases, ingredients will fall faster. Happy Halloween!


Visit our main project page https://store.steampowered.com/app/1597640/Covenanted/
